item.title: PEARに関する覚書き
item.description: # PEARの設定を表示する pear config-show Configuration (channel pear.php.net): ===================================== Auto-discover new Channels auto_discover &lt;not set&gt; Default Channel default_channel pear.php.net HTTP Proxy Server Address http_proxy &lt;not set&gt; PEAR server [DEPRECATED] master_server pear.php.net Default Channel Mirror preferred_mirror pear.php.net Remote Configuration File remote_config &lt;not set&gt; PEAR executables directory bin_dir /usr/bin PEAR documentation directory doc_dir /usr/share/pear/doc PHP extension directory ext_dir /usr/lib64/php/modules PEAR directory php_dir
